src:
看好頂級投資市場 羅芙奧20週年頂級珠寶登場
05 Nov 2019, 02:23 by 財經組
國內年度秋拍盛事—羅芙奧2019秋季拍賣將於12月初登場，除了一系列華人經典，中國、台灣與日本現當代藝術精品進行拍賣之外，今年適逢羅芙奧藝術集團20週年，羅芙奧也在「秋季手袋及精品鑑賞會」上呈獻時尚珍稀的愛馬仕包，更隆重推出多件頂級稀世珠寶，總金額逾新台幣20億元。
羅芙奧表示，此次精選展品包含了特殊皮革的柏金包、凱莉包，更有拍賣市場屢創佳績的限量版霧面SO BLACK ALLIGATOR短吻鱷魚皮30公分柏金包。當年是時任的愛馬仕創意總監尚-保羅·高緹耶（Jean Paul Gaultier）親自操刀設計，並且僅在2010年推出一季，爾後再也未曾出現過，流通量極少，至今亦成為拍賣場上最亮眼的逸品，是為藏家夢寐以求的罕見包款。


限量版霧面SO BLACK ALLIGATOR短吻鱷魚皮30公分柏金包。（羅芙奧提供）

另外，本次秋拍羅芙奧也精選一套海瑞‧溫斯頓（HARRY WINSTON）設計的祖母綠珠寶套裝，由8顆共89.23克拉的祖母綠配鑲鑽石組成，另配以13.22及12.70克拉的祖母綠配鑽石耳環。每顆祖母綠皆呈現出飽滿的色澤且透亮濃綠，散發出深邃迷人的光采，而鑽石的排列則是呈現經典的海瑞‧溫斯頓設計，完美體現珍稀寶石的超凡美感以及獨特魅力。
為了讓更多頂級鑽石收藏家能夠珍藏稀世美鑽，羅芙奧今年也隆重推出一顆逾80克拉的豔彩黃色鑽石。一般而言，一顆切割及打磨後重逾100克拉的鑽石，其原石的重量應為成品的2倍以上，在處理過程中經過最精密的計算以及鬼斧神工的技術，傾全力控制最大克拉數並保留最美色澤，最後成就一顆逾80克拉的豔彩黃色鑽石。

羅芙奧秋拍預展

日期：11月28日（四）至12月1日（日）
時間：10：00～19：00
地點：台北萬豪酒店


更新時間｜2019.11.05 03:48
text:
Optimistic about the top investment market Ravenel 20th anniversary top jewelry debut
05 Nov 2019, 02:23 by Financial Group
Domestic annual autumn event - Ravenel 2019 autumn auction will debut in early December, in addition to a series of Chinese classics, China, Taiwan and Japanese modern and contemporary art auctions, this year coincides with the 20th anniversary of Ravenel Art Group, Luo Fuao also presented the rare and elegant Hermès bag at the "Autumn Handbags and Boutique Appreciation Conference", and launched a number of top rare jewels, totaling more than NT$2 billion.
Ravenel said that the selected exhibits include special leather pavé bags, Kelly bags, and a limited edition fog-faced SO BLACK ALLIGATOR short-shoulder crocodile leather 30-cent gold bag in the auction market. At that time, Hermès creative director Jean Paul Gaultier personally designed the design and launched it only in 2010. It has never appeared before, and the circulation is very small. It has become the most auctioned place. Bright and eye-catching products are rare bags for collectors' dreams.


Limited edition matte SO BLACK ALLIGATOR short kiss crocodile skin 30 cm berold bag. (provided by Ravenel)

In addition, this autumn shoot Rover is also selected by a set of HARRY WINSTON emerald jewelry set, composed of 8 89.23 carats of emerald and set diamonds, with 13.22 and 12.70 carat emerald with diamond earrings. Each emerald is full of color and translucent green, revealing a fascinating brilliance, while the diamonds are arranged in a classic Hayley Winston design that perfectly reflects the extraordinary beauty and unique charm of rare stones. .
In order to allow more top diamond collectors to collect rare diamonds, Ravenel also launched a gorgeous yellow diamond of more than 80 carats this year. Generally speaking, a diamond weighing more than 100 carats after cutting and grinding should have a weight of more than 2 times that of the finished product. After the most precise calculations and techniques, the maximum number of carats is controlled. Preserving the most beautiful colors, and finally achieving a brilliant yellow diamond of more than 80 carats.

Raven Ouqiu Pre-show

Date: November 28th (D) to December 1st (Day)
Time: 10:00～19:00
Venue: Taipei Marriott Hotel


Update time|2019.11.05 03:48
